comments:
Build ID: I20070323-1616

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Use included design and flat file data sets
2. In eclipse select 'View Report in Web Viewer'
3. Select parameters 'Click OK'
4. Click in 'Parameters' button again.
5. Do not change parameters click 'OK'
6. Exception is thrown


More information:
This happens in the latest M6 build of BIRT.

Exception does not happen if
1. Library is not used (even empty one). Delete library in outline tree. Repeat steps 1-5, exception is not thrown.

OR

2. Add library back, but delete 'join_ds' data set. Repeat steps 1-5 exception is not thrown
Created an attachment (id=65411)

Created an attachment (id=65414)
flat file data set 1

Created an attachment (id=65416)
flat file data set 2

Can reproduce this issue.
The first time, ReportRunnable object is from report design, and then the second time it is from document file.
Maybe this document file is incorrect. Reassign to model team to check first.

Please check the following exception trace:
